tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE electricity_consumption_data (
    appliance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_name VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    power_consumed DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE appliance_data (
    appliance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_name STRING,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    energy_consumed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DailyConsumption (
    date DATE,
    appliance_id INT,
    total_consumption DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (date, appliance_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (appliance_id) REFERENCES ApplianceConsumption(appliance_id)
);
CREATE TABLE appliance_energy_consumption (appliance_id INT, date DATE, energy_consumed DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE appliance_details (appliance_id INT, appliance_name VARCHAR(255), category VARCHAR(255), energy_rating VARCHAR(10));
CREATE TABLE appliance_schedule (appliance_id INT, on_time TIME, off_time TIME);
CREATE TABLE daily_energy_report (report_date DATE, total_energy_consumed DECIMAL, peak_usage_time TIME);
